alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN FAIRFIELD AND SOUTHEASTERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 910 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Millersport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Heath, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Millersport, Pleasantville, Fairfield Beach, Harbor Hills, Thornport, Thurston, Kirkersville, Rushville, Gratiot, Toboso and Brownsville This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 120 and 142, and near mile marker 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
